title: Why Crocodiles Sleep With Their Mouths Open
description: Priya finds an egg at school and is rather surprised when it hatches out. What would you do if you discovered a demanding creature with snapping teeth in your pocket? Would you keep it? Listen to Kim tell this fun How and Why story - and find out what happens.
itunes:title: Why Crocodiles Sleep With Their Mouths Open
